com.soen.riskgame.module.core.model

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.riskgame.module.core.model.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Continent is the final stage of the data that is parsed from the map files. Parsed data from mapper class is passed to DTO classes. which will send the data to Continent class Continent class will contains all the information from DTO class and also additional details like list of the countries
    See Also:
    com.soen.riskgame.module.core.mapper
